import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react'; import { AuthContext } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; export default function Login(){ const { login } = useContext(AuthContext); const [email,setEmail]=useState(''); const [password,setPassword]=useState(''); const submit=async e=>{ e.preventDefault(); await login(email,password); window.location.href='/'; }; return (

Sign in

setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder='email' className='w-full p-2 border rounded' />setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder='password' className='w-full p-2 border rounded' />
) }
